mapper.insert: insert into pet (name, pet_type_id, picture, adopt_address, gender) value (#{name}, #{petTypeId}, #{picture},#{adoptAddress}, #{gender})
mapper.update: update pet set adopt_status = #{status} where id = #{petId}
mapper.select: select p.*, pt.type_name as petTypeName from pet p left join pet_type pt on p.pet_type_id = pt.id where p.id = #{id}
